prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon that has a playful demeanor and uses illusions to confuse enemies.
Show me a small Pokemon that loves to play pranks and has a mischievous personality.
Imagine a humanoid Pokemon with quirky features that can mimic other creatures effortlessly.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and enjoys entertaining people.
Design a cute, bipedal Pokemon that has a talent for performance and loves to dance.
Make a Pokemon with a whimsical appearance that can use psychic powers to protect its friends.
Give me a characterful Pokemon that enjoys exploring forests and is known for its friendly nature.
